name: extra-adrenal pheochromocytoma
definition: A malignant pheochromocytoma that originate in the ganglia of the sympathetic nervous system and are named based upon the primary anatomical site of origin. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pheochromocytoma]

clinicalTrials.title: Lenvatinib in Treating Patients With Metastatic or Advanced Pheochromocytoma or Paraganglioma That Cannot Be Removed by Surgery

A Phase II Trial of the DNA Methyl Transferase Inhibitor, Guadecitabine (SGI-110), in Children and Adults With Wild Type GIST,Pheochromocytoma and Paraganglioma Associated With Succinate Dehydrogenase Deficiency and HLRCC-associated Kidney Cancer
